Plot: After being kicked out of a rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of a strict elementary private school, only to try and turn it into a rock band.
Title: School of Rock
Actors: Jack Black, Adam Pascal, Lucas Papaelias, Chris Stack
tomatoConsensus: Black's exuberant, gleeful performance turns School of Rock into a hilarious, rocking good time.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 wins & 17 nominations.
